mapper.insert: insert into user_tb(username, password, email, tel, birth_date, reg_date, role_type_id) values(#{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{birthDate}, now(), 1)
mapper.select: select * from user_tb where username = #{username} and password = #{password}
mapper.update: update user_tb set username = #{username}, password = #{password}, email = #{email}, tel = #{tel}, , birth_date = #{birthDate} where id = #{id}
